settings.title: Settings
settings.desktopAppDescription: Download the desktop application for Windows and Mac
settings.deleteProfileDescription: Permanently remove profile and all associated data

billing.freePlanDescription: This plan is completely free, for lifetime.

deleteProfile.title: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
deleteProfile.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data.

cancelSubscription.title: Are you sure you want to cancel your plan?
cancelSubscription.description: This action is irreversible. Your premium plan will be canceled immediately, and no refunds will be issued for any remaining days.

profileDeleted.title: Profile Deleted
profileDeleted.description: Your profile has been deleted successfully

couldntUpdate.title: Couldn't update profile
couldntUpdate.description: Please fill in all required fields.

profileUpdated.title: Profile updated
profileUpdated.description: Your profile information has been updated successfully.
